Contact

PowerChord Theory is designed to support self-directed learning, with one-on-one guidance available for players who want additional structure, feedback, or support.

Initial Step

Reaching out is the first step in determining whether one-on-one sessions are a good fit.

Follow-Up Process

After receiving a message, a brief follow-up will be sent with a few questions about background, experience level, goals, and current setup. This helps determine the most appropriate path, whether that is ongoing one-on-one guidance, a gear-focused session, or continued self-directed study.

Availability

One-on-one availability is limited in order to maintain quality and focus. Remote sessions are offered by default, with hybrid options available for local players.

For All Inquiries

For questions about one-on-one guidance, gear support, or general topics, email:

oneonone@powerchordtheory.com
